messages.title: Building a stronger economy and a fairer society.
messages.content: Sam Webber and the Liberal Democrats are creating opportunity for everyone. In the next Parliament we will balance the budget, cut taxes for ordinary workers, and invest in health and education.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Balance the budget and cut taxes for ordinary workers.
Cut Income Tax for 24 million ordinary workers.
Provide an extra £2.5 billion per year for struggling school kids, ensuring the biggest ever cash rise in the state pension and extending free childcare.
Create 1.8 million jobs and deliver a record rise in apprenticeships.

issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats will borrow less than Labour and cut less than the Conservatives, creating opportunity for everyone through a stronger economy and a fairer society.
issues.socialWelfare: Provide an extra £2.5 billion per year for struggling school kids.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sam Webber: The best choice for Bromley & Chislehurst

images.caption: Sam calling for political reform and fairer electoral system
